qas.question: What date was the Premier League formed?

answers.text: The competition formed as the FA Premier League on 20 February 1992

qas.question: How much was the deal worth?

answers.text: The deal was worth £1 billion a year domestically as of 2013–14

qas.question: Who secured the domestic rights to broadcast games 116 and 38 respectively?

answers.text: BSkyB and BT Group securing the domestic rights to broadcast 116 and 38 games respectively.

qas.question: How much revenue does the league generate in domestic and international television rights?

answers.text: The league generates €2.2 billion per year in domestic and international television rights

qas.question: In 2014/15, how much were the teams apportioned in revenues?

answers.text: In 2014/15, teams were apportioned revenues of £1.6 billion.

qas.question: When was the Premier League originally formed?
When was the Football League originally founded?

Which club did the Football League decide to break away from?

How much revenue were teams given during 2013/14?

context: <a0_0>The competition formed as the FA Premier League on <a5_0><b12_0>20 February 1992<b12_0/><a5_0/><a0_0/> following the decision of clubs in the <b10_0>Football League First Division<b10_0/> to break away from the Football League, which was originally founded in <a6_0><b11_0>1888<b11_0/><a6_0/>, and take advantage of a lucrative television rights deal. <a1_0>The deal was worth £1 billion a year domestically as of 2013–14<a1_0/>, with <a2_0>BSkyB and BT Group securing the domestic rights to broadcast <a7_0>116<a7_0/> and <a8_0>38<a8_0/> games respectively.<a2_0/> <a3_0>The league generates <a9_0><b13_0>€2.2 billion<b13_0/><a9_0/> per year in domestic and international television rights<a3_0/>. <a4_0>In 2014/15, teams were apportioned revenues of <b14_0>£1.6 billion.
